name: Blade of Vaulted Secrets
tooltip:
Blade of Vaulted SecretsLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Ornate Hilt, 2  Obsidian Idols, 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Bone Scarabs to Warden Haro in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Ornate Hilt
- Obsidian Idol x 2
- Silver Scarab x 5
- Bone Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
